attributes.action: Bring back university tuition fees to Scotland.
attributes.additional_details:
Why should Scotland get the special privilege of having free tuition fees for Scottish students only.

Sign this petition if you believe we should we equal as a United Kingdom in terms of tuition fees.
attributes.background: People of England, Wales and Northern Ireland seemed to be treated differently by the Scottish Government in terms of status - Why do EU students get more benefits than say a student living in Wales - we are a United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
